content: Hello Jeyachandran, nice to meet you. I'm Master, the hiring officer. Thank you for coming in for the technical round today. I must say, your resume is quite impressive. I'd like to start by asking you about your experience as an AI Project Developer at Shine Logics. Can you walk me through the project you developed, a web app for mock interviews utilizing AI to ask voice-based questions based on uploaded resumes? What was your role in this project, and what were some of the challenges you faced in implementing it?
